title: Dwarf
content:
heir own special characteristics.

BG3 Full Game Note: In the full launch of Baldur's Gate 3, Ability Score Points for Races that were present in Early Access are removed. And instead, Ability Score Points in the full game correspond with the Class players will choose.

Dwarf Features in Baldur's Gate 3

Base Racial Speed: Move up to 7.5 m per turn. Dwarven Combat Training: Proficiency with Battleaxe, Handaxe, Light Hammer, and Warhammer. Darkvision: See in the dark up to 12m. Dwarven Resilience
